ca.mcgill.ecse211.tools

Interface MenuCommand


  • public interface MenuCommand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      An action to perform.
      java.lang.String getStatus()
      The updated status of the adjustable value.
      void setStatus(int changeFactor)
      Change your value based on this factor.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        java.lang.String getStatus()
        The updated status of the adjustable value.
        Returns:
        a String, preferably containing a new value each time

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(int changeFactor)
        Change your value based on this factor. It usually gives -1 or +1, so the value can be incremented or decremented.
        Parameters:
        changeFactor - -1 for left button or +1 for right button

      • action

        void action()
        An action to perform. It can be anything, but try not to start any new threads here.
